long_description: An excellent layer for cool-weather hiking, the REI Fosston Fleece jacket combines the all-weather insulation of a plush polyester fleece with stretch panels in key places. Heavyweight polyester fleece provides warmth. Stretch panels in the sides, outer sleeves and collar are strategically placed to enhance flexibility when you're active. Two zip hand pockets and 1 zip chest pocket offer secure storage for essentials. Hem drawcord helps seal in warmth. The REI Fosston Fleece jacket has a chinguard at the top of the front zipper and a soft tricot lining in the collar.
short_description: An excellent layer for cool-weather hiking, the REI Fosston Fleece jacket combines the all-weather insulation of a plush polyester fleece with stretch panels in key places.
